Title: Requires the office for people with developmental disabilities to create a staffing plan for workforce emergencies when experiencing staffing shortages
Summary: Requires the office for people with developmental disabilities to create a staffing plan for workforce emergencies when experiencing staffing shortages.
LawCode: Amd ยง13.17, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring the office for people with developmental disabilities to create a staffing plan for workforce emergencies when experiencing staffing shortages
